titleStmt.title: Perfect trust Psal. 37.5 cast both thy self and thine affairs on God with perfect trust : and thous salt see with patience the effect both sure and just. The question put by a Christian friend to a minister, was, How trust in God may be said to be perfect : The ministers answer, sent by letter, was to this effect.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
